raw_body:
SURIARATCHIE – DELPHINE,​ beloved wife of late Quintus,​ loving mother of Krishni & Ruvini,​ mother-in-law of Mark Laurence & Lasantha Goonetilleke,​ much loved grandmother of Lasanthi & Eshanthi,​ expired. Remains will lie at A.F. Raymond’s Funeral Parlour from 5 p.m. till 8 p.m. on Tuesday 20th February & from 9 a.m. till 11 a.m. on Wednesday 21st February followed by Burial at the General Cemetery Anglican Section at 11.30 a.m. No flowers by request.
012404
